title: PB Fintech shares drop over 10% on plans of healthcare foray
description: Shares of PB Fintech fell over 10% to Rs 1,545 during Thursday's intraday trading on the BSE after the company suggested it might venture into the healthcare sector. The company stated, “We are still exploring, but currently have no decisions to announce. Any decision made will be communicated to the stock exchanges.”
content: Shares of PB Fintech tumbled over 10% to Rs 1,545 in Thursday's intraday trade on BSE after the company indicated that it may foray into the healthcare space.
